detaileddescription.para:
Constructor
client
The shard the event originated on
raw
Raw event text as JSON

briefdescription.para: Acknowledge interaction without displaying a message to the user, for use with button and select menu components.

parameterdescription.para: User function to execute when the api call completes. On success the callback will contain a dpp::confirmation object in confirmation_callback_t::value. On failure, the value is undefined and confirmation_callback_t::is_error() method will return true. You can obtain full error details with confirmation_callback_t::get_error().

memberdef.argsstring: (interaction_response_type t, const message &m, command_completion_event_t callback=utility::log_error()) const
memberdef.name: reply

briefdescription.para: Send a reply for this interaction.

parameterdescription.para: Type of reply to send
Message object to send. Not all fields are supported by Discord.

User function to execute when the api call completes. On success the callback will contain a dpp::confirmation object in confirmation_callback_t::value. On failure, the value is undefined and confirmation_callback_t::is_error() method will return true. You can obtain full error details with confirmation_callback_t::get_error().

memberdef.argsstring: (interaction_response_type t, const std::string &mt, command_completion_event_t callback=utility::log_error()) const
memberdef.name: reply

briefdescription.para: Send a reply for this interaction.

parameterdescription.para: Type of reply to send
The string value to send, for simple text only messages

User function to execute when the api call completes. On success the callback will contain a dpp::confirmation object in confirmation_callback_t::value. On failure, the value is undefined and confirmation_callback_t::is_error() method will return true. You can obtain full error details with confirmation_callback_t::get_error().

briefdescription.para: Send a reply for this interaction. Uses the default type of dpp::ir_channel_message_with_source, a simple message reply.

parameterdescription.para: Message object to send. Not all fields are supported by Discord.

User function to execute when the api call completes. On success the callback will contain a dpp::confirmation object in confirmation_callback_t::value. On failure, the value is undefined and confirmation_callback_t::is_error() method will return true. You can obtain full error details with confirmation_callback_t::get_error().

briefdescription.para: Set the bot to 'thinking' state where you have up to 15 minutes to respond.

parameterdescription.para: True if the thinking state should be ephemeral

User function to execute when the api call completes. On success the callback will contain a dpp::confirmation object in confirmation_callback_t::value. On failure, the value is undefined and confirmation_callback_t::is_error() method will return true. You can obtain full error details with confirmation_callback_t::get_error().

briefdescription.para: Get original response message for this interaction.

parameterdescription.para: Function to call when the API call completes. On success the callback will contain a dpp::message object in confirmation_callback_t::value. On failure, the value is undefined and confirmation_callback_t::is_error() method will return true. You can obtain full error details with confirmation_callback_t::get_error().

Function to call when the API call completes. On success the callback will contain a dpp::message object in confirmation_callback_t::value. On failure, the value is undefined and confirmation_callback_t::is_error() method will return true. You can obtain full error details with confirmation_callback_t::get_error().

briefdescription.para: Delete original response message for this interaction. This cannot be used on an ephemeral interaction response.

parameterdescription.para: Function to call when the API call completes. On success the callback will contain a dpp::confirmation object in confirmation_callback_t::value. On failure, the value is undefined and confirmation_callback_t::is_error() method will return true. You can obtain full error details with confirmation_callback_t::get_error().
The name of the command line parameter to retrieve the value for

simplesect.para: command_value Returns the value of the first option that matches the given name. If no matches are found, an empty variant is returned.

parameterdescription.para: if the interaction is not for a command

briefdescription.para: Cancels the event in progress. Any other attached lambdas for this event after this one are not called. Note that event cancellation is a thread local state, and not stored in the object (because object which can be cancelled is const during the event, and cannot itself contain the changeable state).

simplesect.para: const event_dispatch_t& reference to self for chaining

briefdescription.para: Returns true if the event is cancelled. Note that event cancellation is a thread local state, and not stored in the object (because object which can be cancelled is const during the event, and cannot itself contain the changeable state).

simplesect.para: true if the event is cancelled

briefdescription.para: Raw event data. If you are using json on your websocket, this will contain json, and if you are using ETF as your websocket protocol, it will contain raw ETF data.
Shard the event came from. Note that for some events, notably voice events, this may be nullptr.
User has issued a slash command.
